text:
All ideas in the
beginning or so fragile.

An idea can either turn
into something real
or pretty early get snuffed.

We're in a really
unique time where

there are so many products
that are coming to market.

Our team is very
much focused on yes,

and, and figuring out, OK, this
is one thing, but how do we

make it better, rather than
how do I tear down the idea.

The thing that's been really
special about New Venture

is that there's this
whole community here,

and a lot of different
people have been
able to help along the way.

I had to stand on a stage and
put myself out there and say,
here's this thing.

And then everyone can say
what if it's terrible.
It's freeing in a way.

If it's something that catches
on and someone says I get it,

then you can start to build
towards the 'I get it' moment.

If not, then it
gives you a chance

to let it go and figure out
what is the thing that I want
to keep running with forward.
